segments.text: What's wrong , Jerry ? You look so upset .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To be honest , I was just dumped .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I'm sorry to hear that . You can go on a holiday cheer you up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , thanks . I'm not in the mood for traveling .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on . A trip will do you good . Are you doing anything this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was planning on doing a lot of wallowing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , my friends and I are planning on going to Shangri-La on Saturday . Do you want to come with us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not very far from here . We'll fly . It's about one and a half hours .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is a large canyon , vast grasslands , ancient forests and mountain lakes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , the scenery there is breathtaking . I have some pictures at home . You can come over and take a look if you like
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . Then I can make up my mind .
segments.speaker: S2
